amendment.description: Amendment directs the State Department to closely monitor and take into account human rights progress in Ethiopia as it obligates funds appropriated in the bill for that country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in House Rept. 104-167, as modified, to direct the State Department to closely monitor and take into account human rights progress in Ethiopia as it obligates funds appropriated in the bill for that country.

action.text: Jackson-Lee amendment (A040) modified by unanimous consent. Modification directs the State Department to closely monitor human rights progress in Ethiopia and to take such progress into consideration when obligating funds appropriated for Ethiopia.
On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee amendment (A040) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
